de.wota.gamemaster

Class AILoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.wota.gamemaster.AILoader

  • public class AILoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles dynamic loading of player AIs.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String AI_PACKAGE 
      private java.lang.String searchpath 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AILoader()
      Creates a new AILoader using the directory of the executable as searchpath.
      AILoader(java.lang.String path)
      Creates a new AILoader using the given directory or .jar file as searchpath.

      • AILoader

        public AILoader()
        Creates a new AILoader using the directory of the executable as searchpath.

      • AILoader

        public AILoader(java.lang.String path)
        Creates a new AILoader using the given directory or .jar file as searchpath.
        Parameters:
        path - directory or .jar file where player AIs should be located

    • Method Detail

      • loadQueen

        public java.lang.Class<? extends QueenAI> loadQueen(java.lang.String className)
        Dynamically loads the class object representing the given QueenAI implementation. The class is assumed to be located in the "ai" package.
        Parameters:
        className - simple name of the class to be loaded (without package qualifier)
        Returns:
        Class object representing an implementation of QueenAI

      • getAIName

        public static java.lang.String getAIName(java.lang.Class<? extends QueenAI> queenAIClass)
        Get the human-readable name of the AI.
        Parameters:
        queenAIClass - player AI
        Returns:
        name of the player AI

      • getAICreator

        public static java.lang.String getAICreator(java.lang.Class<? extends QueenAI> queenAIClass)
        Get the human-readable name of the AI's creator.
        Parameters:
        queenAIClass - player AI
        Returns:
        name of the AI's creator
